original_title: Ayumi Hamasaki Countdown Live 2010-2011 A: Do It Again
overview: Live Blu-ray release from Ayumi Hamasaki featuring footage of  her performance at "COUNTDOWN LIVE 2010-2011 A - do it again -" held at Yoyogi National Gymnasium on December 31, 2010. Features a collaboration song "Dream On" with Naoya Urata, songs from the latest album "Love songs," and more.
tagline: Ayumi Hamasaki Countdown Live 2010-2011 A: Do It Again
title: Ayumi Hamasaki Countdown Live 2010-2011 A: Do It Again
